title: Create Service Detail Component
description: Develop UI component for displaying detailed service information including provider and category details

user_stories: As a customer, I want to view detailed service information so that I can make informed booking decisions
As a service provider, I want to see my service details so that I can verify accuracy
business_rules: Service detail view must show complete service information including category
Service detail view must follow the design system
Service detail view must handle loading states and error messages
Service detail view must display provider information
edge_cases: Handling loading states for service details
Managing error conditions when service data is not available
Displaying service information with proper category details
Handling services with missing or incomplete information

acceptance_criteria: Service detail component shows complete service information
Service detail component follows the design system
Service detail component handles loading states and error conditions properly
Service detail component integrates with Service Management API endpoints
Service detail component displays provider and category information

integration_tests: Service detail integration with backend APIs

additional_context.technical_notes: Implement service detail component following Angular best practices. Ensure proper integration with service management API. Display related information like category and provider details.
additional_context.security_considerations: Ensure proper authorization checks for service detail access. Protect sensitive service information. Validate data before display.
